Name: Heroes from the Past: Joan of Arc
About the game: Help Joan of Arc to build a new Kingdom and change the fate of the people. Journey through beautiful scenery, relaxing music and the thrilling process of building a city in this engaging Match 3 game. Dive into an epic story of honor and courage and save the day in Heroes from the Past: Joan of Arc! - Build a medieval city - Three game play modes: swap, pop, chain - Exciting adventure
